sentences.en: And both figures are well below the internationally recognized safety level.
sentences.cn: 这两个数字都在公认的警戒线以内.
国际上禁止使用化学武器。

sentences.en: He is internationally famous as a character actor.
sentences.cn: 他以出色的演技而闻名世界.

sentences.en: I am one of the few young women who has made it as a writer financially and internationally.
sentences.cn: 我是为数不多的既获得财富又享有国际知名度的年轻女作家之一。

sentences.en: ICM is an internationally patented call waiting service suited to the domestic market.
sentences.cn: 因特网呼叫管理（ICM）是一项获得国际专利的、适合国内市场需求的呼叫等待服务。

sentences.en: It has grown into an internationally renowned event.
sentences.cn: 它已发展成为举世闻名的盛典了.

sentences.en: Not a few of them have achieved successes in science and technology and are internationally known.
sentences.cn: 他们中不少人还在学科学技术上作出成绩,蜚声国际.

sentences.en: Opportunities will improve as the company expands domestically and internationally.
sentences.cn: 随着国内业务和国际业务的扩展，该公司将获得更好的机会。

sentences.en: The great - grandson of an Indian chief from Oklahoma had become internationally famous.
sentences.cn: 这个来自俄克拉荷马州的印第安人首领的曾孙成为全球瞩目的人物.

sentences.en: The Kravchenko trial became a cause celebre in Paris and internationally.
sentences.cn: 克拉夫琴克一案在巴黎甚至全世界曾经轰动一时。

sentences.en: The price must be right in order to compete internationally.
sentences.cn: 为了在国际上竞争,定价必须适当.

sentences.en: There are only two internationally recognised certificates in Teaching English as a Foreign Language.
sentences.cn: “作为外语的英语教学”只有两种国际上认可的证书。

sentences.en: These days businesses have to be able to compete internationally.
sentences.cn: 如今，企业必须要有实力参与国际竞争。

sentences.en: These products are of high quality and able to compete internationally.
sentences.cn: 这些产品品质很好,在国际市场上有竞争能力.

sentences.en: These standard containers are internationally agreed as to dimensions, weight, structural strength and other features.
sentences.cn: 这种标准集装箱在大小, 重量 、 结构强度及其他方面,国际上均有统一规定.

sentences.en: We're not just looking at making it big in the UK, we want to be big internationally.
sentences.cn: 我们不仅想在英国取得成功，还想在国际上扬名立万。

words.tran_cn: 国际主义者；国际法学家
使国际化；置于国际管理下

trans.tran_cn: 国际性地，国际上地，国际间地
trans.tran_en: in many different parts of the world
